name: BRE3
description: BRE3 isn’t just a product or a platform — it’s a decentralized movement, born at the intersection of culture, consensus, and community. In Web3, value isn’t created by institutions. It’s forged by collective conviction — through shared belief, aligned action, and grassroots energy. At its core, BRE3 DAO is about bringing the spirit of GameStop — the retail rebellion, the community uprising — fully on-chain. We’re here to hand the keys back to everyday participants: giving them not just access, but ownership, governance, and upside. In BRE3, you’re not a user — you’re a BUILDER You’re not watching from the sidelines — you’re lighting the fire. We call ourselves Brewers — not just a name, but a shared identity and responsibility. Together, we brew belief, shape the rules, and split the rewards.
